title: Jailkeep

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Keep someone in your jail at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Jailkeeping someone fails all visits against them, while roleblocking them.
- You may jailkeep yourself. Become roleblock immune when you do this.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
"You tried to leave, but your door was inexplicably locked."
"You could not visit your target because their door was locked."

desc:
Post 375
*You don't know when they'll strike. Why must you leave? No! You mustn't! Stop.*
